extracted_playbook.title: Review Ivanti's Security Advisory
extracted_playbook.description: Consult Ivanti's security advisory to understand the details of the vulnerability and recommended actions.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Affected Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade supported EPMM versions 11.10, 11.9, and 11.8 to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability. Consider upgrading unsupported older versions as well.
